code: export async function isImgUrl(url){const img=new Image();img.src=url;return await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{img.onload=()=>resolve(true);img.onerror=()=>resolve(false);});}export async function isValidMedia(media_url){const res=await fetch(media_url,{method:'HEAD'});if(res.ok==true){return true;}return false;}export function getFileName(str){return str.substring(str.lastIndexOf('/')+1);}
